edu.gmu.team1.idt2014.reportwriters

Class AbstractReportWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.gmu.team1.idt2014.reportwriters.AbstractReportWriter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ConsoleReportWriter, FileReportWriter, StringReportWriter

    public abstract class AbstractReportWriter
extends java.lang.Object
    This Interface documents all that is necessary to create your own Report writer. After implementing this interface. You can simply use GMUT.tester().setReportWriter();

    This allows for many different report writers and formats to be utilized. Be warned however that LogViewer expects the Default ReportWriter format.
